com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.serializable
Class SerializableCompositeMonitor

java.lang.Object
  com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.serializable.SerializableMonitor
      com.orbitz.monitoring.api.monitor.serializable.SerializableCompositeMonitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
CompositeMonitor, Monitor, java.io.Serializable
public class SerializableCompositeMonitor
extends SerializableMonitor
implements CompositeMonitor

A CompositeMonitor implementation that is specifically created for serialization.

See Also:
SerializableMonitor, Serialized Form

Method Detail

addChildMonitor

public void addChildMonitor(Monitor monitor)
Description copied from interface: CompositeMonitor
Adds a child monitor to this composite monitor. The interface makes no prescription as to whether the children are ordered.

Specified by:
addChildMonitor in interface CompositeMonitor
Parameters:
monitor - the Monitor to be added as a child of this Monitor

getChildMonitors

public java.util.Collection getChildMonitors()
Description copied from interface: CompositeMonitor
Gets the child monitors of this monitors.

Specified by:
getChildMonitors in interface CompositeMonitor
Returns:
a collection of child monitors that were captured. This returns an empty collection if none were set.

getInheritableAttributes

public java.util.Map getInheritableAttributes()
Description copied from interface: CompositeMonitor
Gets those attributes that can be inherited by the child monitors. These attributes will be added to the child monitor when it is created.

Specified by:
getInheritableAttributes in interface CompositeMonitor
Returns:
a reference to the map of the inheritable attributes that should be added to the child monitors
